scripts.init: npm run build; cd _book; git init; git add .; git commit -am "init"; git remote add origin git@github.com:jirengu/book.git && exit 0
scripts.upload:_book: cd _book ; cp -rf code _book; git add . ; git commit -am "upload" ; git push origin master
scripts.upload:src: git add . ; git commit -am "upload" ; git push origin master
scripts.start: npm run build; npm run upload:_book; npm run upload:src
